author: cooton
title: Voted Targets 2222
description: Community leaders and elected officials need activist driven targets with a realistic achievement date,  to address local and global matters
solution: Citizens vote on activist targets via a Dapp, target achievement dates can extend  from 1 to 200 years from 2022. Incentivised with a token
experience:
Retired resilient entrepreneur having successfully developed solutions for clients.
